author: Kristina Wong
title: Tom Cotton Introduces Bill to Boost Funding for Military Assets in Indo-Pacific
description: Cotton on Wednesday announced a bill to surge investment for military infrastructure, weapons, and other assets in the Indo-Pacific region.
content:
Sen. Tom Cotton (R-AR) on Wednesday announced a bill to surge investment for military infrastructure, weapons, and other assets in the Indo-Pacific region.
The bill, dubbed the “Forging Operational Resistance to Chinese Expansion (FORCE) Act,” would increase… [+1667 chars]
